# The `FunctionAttrs.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file implements interprocedural passes which walk the call-graph deducing and/or propagating function attributes. <a href="#details">More...</a>

This tracker checks whether callees are in the SCC, and if so it does not consider that a capture, instead adding it to the &quot;Uses&quot; list and continuing with the analysis. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-functionattrs-cpp-/argumentusestracker/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

## Description {#details}

This file implements interprocedural passes which walk the call-graph deducing and/or propagating function attributes.

<SectionDefinition>

### addArgumentAttrsFromCallsites() {#a35c66c8d7328637260a03faa73269783}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool addArgumentAttrsFromCallsites (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
If a callsite has arguments that are also arguments to the parent function, try to propagate attributes from the callsite&#39;s arguments to the parent&#39;s arguments.

This may be important because inlining can cause information loss when attribute knowledge disappears with the inlined call.

### checkFunctionMemoryAccess() {#a8b8a65f41fa956162c7877cb20bc53b9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static std::pair&lt; MemoryEffects, MemoryEffects &gt; checkFunctionMemoryAccess (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F, bool ThisBody, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults">AAResults</a> &amp; AAR, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> SCCNodeSet &amp; SCCNodes)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns the memory access attribute for function F using AAR for <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a> results, where SCCNodes is the current SCC.

If ThisBody is true, this function may examine the function body and will return a result pertaining to this copy of the function. If it is false, the result will be based only on <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a> results for the function declaration; it will be assumed that some other (perhaps less optimized) version of the function may be selected at link time.

The return value is split into two parts: <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memory">Memory</a> effects that always apply, and additional memory effects that apply if any of the functions in the SCC can access argmem.

Definition at line <a href="#l00163">163</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/functionattrs-cpp">FunctionAttrs.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Returns the memory access attribute for function F using AAR for AA results,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// where SCCNodes is the current SCC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If ThisBody is true, this function may examine the function body and will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// return a result pertaining to this copy of the function. If it is false, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// result will be based only on AA results for the function declaration; it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// will be assumed that some other (perhaps less optimized) version of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// function may be selected at link time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The return value is split into two parts: Memory effects that always apply,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and additional memory effects that apply if any of the functions in the SCC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// can access argmem.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::pair&lt;MemoryEffects, MemoryEffects&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163" lineLink="#a8b8a65f41fa956162c7877cb20bc53b9"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#a8b8a65f41fa956162c7877cb20bc53b9">checkFunctionMemoryAccess</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ThisBody, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults">AAResults</a> &amp;AAR,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scan the function body for instructions that may read or write memory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/atomicexpandpass-cpp/#a1bcc06b1cb86bd0ea08f33323190bdaa">instructions</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some instructions can be ignored even if they read or write memory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Detect these now, skipping to the next instruction if one is found.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;CallBase&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can optimistically ignore calls to functions in the same SCC, with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// two caveats:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#42; Calls with operand bundles may have additional effects.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#42; Argument memory accesses may imply additional effects depending on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    what the argument location is.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;hasOperandBundles() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;getCalledFunction() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">          SCCNodes.count(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;getCalledFunction())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep track of which additional locations are accessed if the SCC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// turns out to access argmem.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="#a3c51f913ac7ff81eb9d5891e5f77a347">addArgLocs</a>(RecursiveArgME, <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9db8c44b250b90e3ab7e4d144e7c9c2ea6524b183b5cd0850f2cff6d30d581af9">ModRefInfo::ModRef</a>, AAR);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a44ad2b29af9ebe3d12a99843a7594757">MemoryEffects</a> CallME = AAR.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults/#a98f54e18da022cdb497fbbeed4488276">getMemoryEffects</a>(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the call doesn&#39;t access memory, we&#39;re done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CallME.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryeffectsbase/#a513f55e474dba6d6c2507997e9920b6d">doesNotAccessMemory</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A pseudo probe call shouldn&#39;t change any function attribute since it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// doesn&#39;t translate to a real instruction. It comes with a memory access</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tag to prevent itself being removed by optimizations and not block</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CachedPrevailingSummary.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a53408c95a7bfb5443b43fb2134c3eb23">count</a>(VI))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// At this point, prevailing symbols have been resolved. The following leads</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to returning a conservative result:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - Multiple instances with local linkage. Normally local linkage would be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   unique per module</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   as the GUID includes the module path. We could have a guid alias if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   there wasn&#39;t any distinguishing path when each file was compiled, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   that should be rare so we&#39;ll punt on those.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// These next 2 cases should not happen and will assert:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - Multiple instances with external linkage. This should be caught in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   symbol resolution</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - Non-existent FunctionSummary for Aliasee. This presents a hole in our</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   knowledge meaning we have to go conservative.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Otherwise, we calculate attributes for a function as:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   1 If we have a local linkage, take its attributes. If there&#39;s somehow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      multiple, bail and go conservative.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   2 If we have an external/WeakODR/LinkOnceODR linkage check that it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      prevailing, take its attributes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   3 If we have a Weak/LinkOnce linkage the copies can have semantic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      differences. However, if the prevailing copy is known it will be used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      so take its attributes. If the prevailing copy is in a native file</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      all IR copies will be dead and propagation will go conservative.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   4 AvailableExternally summaries without a prevailing copy are known to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      occur in a couple of circumstances:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      a. An internal function gets imported due to its caller getting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         imported, it becomes AvailableExternally but no prevailing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         definition exists. Because it has to get imported along with its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         caller the attributes will be captured by propagating on its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         caller.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      b. C++11 &#91;temp.explicit&#93;p10 can generate AvailableExternally</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         definitions of explicitly instanced template declarations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         for inlining which are ultimately dropped from the TU. Since this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         is localized to the TU the attributes will have already made it to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         the callers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      These are edge cases and already captured by their callers so we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      ignore these for now. If they become relevant to optimize in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///      future this can be revisited.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   5 Otherwise, go conservative.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CachedPrevailingSummary&#91;VI&#93; = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionsummary">FunctionSummary</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/globalmergefunctions-h/#a54f7429fa5826ff9909619b76d2bf319a509820290d57f333403f490dde7316f4">Local</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionsummary">FunctionSummary</a> &#42;Prevailing = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;GVS : VI.getSummaryList()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!GVS-&gt;isLive())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionsummary">FunctionSummary</a> &#42;FS = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;FunctionSummary&gt;</a>(GVS-&gt;getBaseObject());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Virtual and Unknown (e.g. indirect) calls require going conservative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!FS || FS-&gt;fflags().HasUnknownCall)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a308b65a044b4f53e31a2026a81c991d2">GlobalValue::isLocalLinkage</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxilfinalizelinkage-cpp/#ae721973516c2b86042a5127b776e2806">Linkage</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/globalmergefunctions-h/#a54f7429fa5826ff9909619b76d2bf319a509820290d57f333403f490dde7316f4">Local</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionsummary">FunctionSummary</a> &#42;CallerSummary =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="#a306df028c5841358ae4f88426c76850a">calculatePrevailingSummary</a>(V, CachedPrevailingSummary, IsPrevailing);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   void f(int &#42;x, int &#42;y) &#123; if (...) f(x, y); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is an example where the graph is disconnected. The SCCIterator requires a</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// uses every node. Because the graph is directed and nothing points into</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This tracker checks whether callees are in the SCC, and if so it does not</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Conservatively, just check for calls in the entry block that are guaranteed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to execute.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We also want to compute readonly/readnone/writeonly. With a small number</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of false negatives, we can assume that any pointer which is captured</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// isn&#39;t going to be provably readonly or readnone, since by definition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we can&#39;t analyze all uses of a captured pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The false negatives happen when the pointer is captured by a function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that promises readonly/readnone behaviour on the pointer, then the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pointer&#39;s lifetime ends before anything that writes to arbitrary memory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also, a readonly/readnone pointer may be returned, but returning a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pointer is capturing it.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Perform all the requested attribute inference actions according to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// attribute predicates stored before.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-functionattrs-cpp-/attributeinferer/#a322a5409ce5be2c9d2045f16b8439048"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-functionattrs-cpp-/attributeinferer/#a322a5409ce5be2c9d2045f16b8439048">AttributeInferer::run</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-functionattrs-cpp-/#ae5e7383d35ed634befab95c8c2c99a1b">SCCNodeSet</a> &amp;SCCNodes,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;Function &#42;, 8&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;InferenceDescriptor, 4&gt;</a> InferInSCC = InferenceDescriptors;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Go through all the functions in SCC and check corresponding attribute</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// assumptions for each of them. Attributes that are invalid for this SCC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be removed from InferInSCC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> : SCCNodes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No attributes whose assumptions are still valid - done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InferInSCC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if our attributes ever need scanning/can be scanned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1739"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac9a7de5a04920954ac964059cfc428ad">llvm::erase&#95;if</a>(InferInSCC, &#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-functionattrs-cpp-/attributeinferer/inferencedescriptor">InferenceDescriptor</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1740"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>.SkipFunction(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1741"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1742"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1743"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove from further inference (invalidate) when visiting a function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1744"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that has no instructions to scan/has an unsuitable definition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1745"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;isDeclaration() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1746"><span class="doxyHighlight">             (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>.RequiresExactDefinition &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;hasExactDefinition());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1748"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each attribute still in InferInSCC that doesn&#39;t explicitly skip F,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set up the F instructions scan to verify assumptions of the attribute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;InferenceDescriptor, 4&gt;</a> InferInThisFunc;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4d13fd05401d8eb0c97b9864a0eb6028">llvm::copy&#95;if</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-functionattrs-cpp-/attributeinferer/inferencedescriptor">InferenceDescriptor</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>.SkipFunction(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>); &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InferInThisFunc.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1758"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1759"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start instruction scan.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/atomicexpandpass-cpp/#a1bcc06b1cb86bd0ea08f33323190bdaa">instructions</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac9a7de5a04920954ac964059cfc428ad">llvm::erase&#95;if</a>(InferInThisFunc, &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-functionattrs-cpp-/attributeinferer/inferencedescriptor">InferenceDescriptor</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>.InstrBreaksAttribute(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove attribute from further inference on any other functions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because attribute assumptions have just been violated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1766"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac9a7de5a04920954ac964059cfc428ad">llvm::erase&#95;if</a>(InferInSCC, &#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-functionattrs-cpp-/attributeinferer/inferencedescriptor">InferenceDescriptor</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1770"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1772"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1773"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InferInThisFunc.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1774"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1775"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1778"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InferInSCC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1779"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1780"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1781"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> : SCCNodes)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1782"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At this point InferInSCC contains only functions that were either:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1783"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - explicitly skipped from scan/inference, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1784"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - verified to have no instructions that break attribute assumptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1785"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hence we just go and force the attribute for all non-skipped functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1786"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> : InferInSCC) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1801"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper for non-Convergent inference predicate InstrBreaksAttribute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1802" lineLink="#ae64bb5b78cd6a7e4568e355e6422f6f4"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ae64bb5b78cd6a7e4568e355e6422f6f4">InstrBreaksNonConvergent</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1803"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-functionattrs-cpp-/#ae5e7383d35ed634befab95c8c2c99a1b">SCCNodeSet</a> &amp;SCCNodes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// indirect call and omit it from the node set used below.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Res.HasUnknownCall = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Track whether any functions in this SCC have an unknown call edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: if this is ever a performance hit, we can common it with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subsequent routines which also do scans over the instructions of the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2208"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Res.HasUnknownCall) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2210"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;CB = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;CallBase&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2360"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If F is internal and all of its uses are calls from a non-recursive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2361"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// functions, then none of its calls could in fact recurse without going</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// through a function marked norecurse, and so we can mark this function too</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as norecurse. Note that the uses must actually be calls -- otherwise</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a pointer to this function could be returned from a norecurse function but</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2382" lineLink="#ab389f58bce3bb2dcd1eb8284f46064ee"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ab389f58bce3bb2dcd1eb8284f46064ee">deduceFunctionAttributeInRPO</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazycallgraph">LazyCallGraph</a> &amp;CG) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We only have a post-order SCC traversal (because SCCs are inherently</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// discovered in post-order), so we accumulate them in a vector and then walk</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it in reverse. This is simpler than using the RPO iterator infrastructure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because we need to combine SCC detection and the PO walk of the call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// graph. We can also cheat egregiously because we&#39;re primarily interested in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// synthesizing norecurse and so we can only save the singular SCCs as SCCs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with multiple functions in them will clearly be recursive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2390"></CodeLine>
